startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of URLs to start scraping from. You can provide a single URL as a string or multiple URLs as an array.

maxPages.title: Max pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape. Set to 0 for unlimited.

maxDepth.title: Max crawling depth
maxDepth.description: Maximum depth of links to follow. Set to 1 for single page scraping, higher values for crawling.

allowedDomains.title: Allowed domains
allowedDomains.description: List of domains to restrict crawling to. Leave empty to allow all domains from start URLs.

customHeaders.title: Custom headers
customHeaders.description: Custom HTTP headers to send with requests.

waitForSelector.title: Wait for selector
waitForSelector.description: CSS selector to wait for before extracting data. Useful for dynamic content.

includeImages.title: Include images
includeImages.description: Whether to extract image URLs from pages.

includeLinks.title: Include links
includeLinks.description: Whether to extract links from pages.

includeMetadata.title: Include metadata
includeMetadata.description: Whether to extract page metadata (meta tags, structured data).

includeHtml.title: Include HTML
includeHtml.description: Whether to include the full HTML content in results.
